# Networks

Further reading:

- Scott B. Weingart, "[Demystifying Networks, Parts I & II](http://journalofdigitalhumanities.org/1-1/demystifying-networks-by-scott-weingart/)," *Journal of Digital Humanities* 1, no. 1 (2011).
